getBsplineFilter(int) - Static method in class big.process1D.spline.Bspline
Returns an EvenSymmetricFIRFilter object that contains the sequence of coefficients bn[k] = βn(k) for k ∈ [0…⌊n ∕ 2⌋] when the degree n of the B-spline is not smaller than 2, and the identity when n ∈ {0, 1}.

getTruncatedInverseBsplineFilter(int, int) - Static method in class big.process1D.spline.Bspline

H

hidden - Variable in class big.ij.snake2D.Snake2DNode
Methods of the class Snake2DKeeper are allowed to interactively display (as a cross) the nodes stored in Snake2DNode objects only if their hidden flag is set to false.
